name: Public Warehousing; Farm Products, Refrigerated Goods, Household Goods
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Providers of storage and warehousing for farm products,
refrigerated storage for perishable products, and storage for
household goods and furniture.
For merchants that provide local storage and trucking services, use
MCC 4214.
